name: Fiscal Finesse
title: Strong Fiscal Policy
description: Samoa's fiscal policy rating stands at an impressive 4.5 in 2023, showcasing its robust financial management strategies.

name: Administrative Adeptness
title: Quality Public Administration
description: With a public administration rating of 4 in 2023, Samoa demonstrates effective governance and administrative capabilities.

name: Revenue Rulers
title: Efficient Revenue Mobilization
description: Samoa's efficiency in revenue mobilization is rated at 4.5 in 2023, indicating a well-structured tax system and revenue collection.

name: Tourism Tumble
title: Low International Tourism Expenditure
description: In 2020, Samoa's international tourism expenditure was approximately $1.8 million, reflecting a need for growth in this sector.

name: Contraception Conundrum
title: High Unmet Need for Contraception
description: As of 2020, 38.9% of married women aged 15-49 in Samoa have an unmet need for contraception, highlighting a significant public health challenge.

name: Import Isolation
title: Minimal Imports from Low- and Middle-Income Economies
description: In 2023, only 0.16% of Samoa's merchandise imports came from low- and middle-income economies outside the region, indicating limited trade diversification.

name: Subsidy Strategy
title: Moderate Subsidies and Transfers
description: In 2021, subsidies and other transfers accounted for 6.13% of Samoa's expenses, reflecting a balanced approach to fiscal support.

name: Public Sector Prowess
title: Solid Public Sector Management
description: Samoa's public sector management and institutions cluster average is 4.1 in 2023, showcasing effective governance structures.
